patthana23.6:1.1: Nakusalaṃ napītisahagataṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca akusalo pītisahagato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṃkhittaṃ.) Hetuyā nava …pe… vipāke tīṇi …pe… avigate nava.
patthana23.6:2.1: Nakusalaṃ nasukhasahagataṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca akusalo sukhasahagato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṃkhittaṃ.) Hetuyā nava …pe… vipāke tīṇi …pe… avigate nava.
patthana23.6:3.1: Nakusalaṃ naupekkhāsahagataṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca akusalo upekkhāsahagato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṃkhittaṃ.) Hetuyā nava …pe… vipāke tīṇi …pe… avigate nava.
